heading: HR00705
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE IMPLEMENTATION OF QUARANTINE PROCEDURES BY THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE AND THE INSPECTION OF COLD STORAGE WAREHOUSES AND CONTAINER VANS WHICH ARE POSSIBLE SOURCES OF THE OUTBREAK OF THE AFRICAN SWINE FEVER IN THE COUNTRY

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00705
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE IMPLEMENTATION OF QUARANTINE PROCEDURES BY THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE AND THE INSPECTION OF COLD STORAGE WAREHOUSES AND CONTAINER VANS WHICH ARE POSSIBLE SOURCES OF THE OUTBREAK OF THE AFRICAN SWINE FEVER IN THE COUNTRY
